ActiveFeatureLicenseMetric.name: ActiveFeatureLicenseMetric
ActiveFeatureLicenseMetric.description: Represents the number of active, assigned, and purchased feature licenses in the org.

ActiveUserCount.description: Number of users assigned this feature license who have logged in within the last 30 days.

AssignedUserCount.description: Number of users assigned this feature license.

MetricsDate.description: Date that feature license metrics were collected.

TotalLicenseCount.description: The number of feature licenses in the organization.
